long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the iconic Mortal Kombat universe with this stunning live wallpaper featuring the legendary fighters of the franchise. Watch your favorite characters like Scorpion, Sub-Zero, and Liu Kang come to life in a battle of epic proportions. Whether you're a long-time fan or a newcomer, this live wallpaper brings the intensity of the Mortal Kombat tournament to your screen with every tab you open. Get ready for high-energy action and unforgettable moves!

Key Features
⚔️ Stunning Mortal Kombat Characters: Watch Scorpion, Sub-Zero, and other legendary fighters in action.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search the web while being immersed in the world of Mortal Kombat.
🕒 Clock & Date: Track time easily while enjoying the intense battle on your screen.
🎯 Customizable Shortcuts: Add your favorite websites for quick access.
🔗 Manage Extensions: Convenient "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" links in the bottom-left corner.
Bring the Mortal Kombat action to your browser with this live wallpaper—perfect for fans who love the thrill of the tournament!
